favourite.article: If we know all the "because," we will love Him very much.
Lord Jesus, I love You as the Spirit who deep within my spirit lives.
God's love is so sweet and I love God too.
Beautiful song. I love my God too.
We Love God for all that He is to us.

I love God!
I Love God, Because He Loved Me, And He Still Loves Me! Thank You Lord!

I love God because He came in time to be the Son of Man. I love God because He gave Himself for me. I love God because He conquered death that I might live in Him. I love God because He still loves me!
Oh what a wonderful hymn this truly is. What a precious Father we have!
Lord Jesus, I love You not only because what You have done for me, I love You, because whom You are! Lord You are so beautiful, so attractive to me! Lord, teach me to love You more and more each day!
Amen, Lord Jesus Christ...I love You.
Wow, I love God too...
Oh Lord Jesus! We love You!
The Lord has been processed to be my LIFE WITHIN!!! LORD JESUS!!!!
I love Him for all that He is!! Praise the Lord we can enjoy Him as our everything!
O Lord Jesus! God is love! He has died for us because He has loved us first! I thank God for this day and that He may live in us eternally!

I have been enjoying this hymn very much! I enjoy every word here, but the most enjoyable sentence to me is I love Him as the Spirit, who deep within my spirit lives. Personally, no one that is closer to me than the One who lives in me. He is invisible, but He is real, lovely and enjoyable. Praise the Lord! :)
Oh Lord Jesus we love You. We dedicate ourselves to You!!!! Amen!!!
This is my favourite hymn, it is so true and moving! I love God because He conquered death that I might live in Him! Praise the Lord!
Amen!!!!!!! God love us.
Amen I'd like to echo the brother from Fremont. This song was so enjoyable at our recent SST. Hallelujah! We have so many reasons to love our God and He still loves us!!

I love God because He still loves me! We sang this song at the Summer School of Truth and it touched me so much, because the Lord still loves us in all our situations no matter what we do, and through His grace we can love God! Praise the Lord!
Praise the Lord, brothers and sisters! We can love God! Oh Lord, amen.
Oh! Lord! Jesus!
Lord Jesus I love You for everything You've done for me! This hymn could be endless with all the reasons we have to love Him as we do.
I love this song because I love God very much and I enjoy God with this song. What a happiness that God's love is eternal and He loves us with an everlasting love.

I love this song because I can touch God through it!! people enjoying to Christ!! He is the best!!
Praise the Lord for He first loved us!
I LOVE THE LORD, BECAUSE HE MAKE A RANDSOM FOR ME. PTL
Oh Lord Jesus! I just love the Lord so much. This song reminds me of how much I love the Lord. He just brings a joy to my life.
I love this song becuz it's the best! I'm 12 years old and into this song a lot! It's a song to the Lord and with the Lord. And MOST of all why WE love Him!
I like this song because the song make me life. And I have to love Lord much more.

I appreciate this song so much because it aknowledges the fact that He loved us way before the foundation of the world. Also it is one of the first songs that captivated me during my first years that the Lord let me go the High School bro's conference, back in 2000. It is now the Fall of 2004 and I still love God because He has made us part of His eternal plan, thank You God!!!!
